markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fortune's Coin](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2190)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=76" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 114 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This coin is struck with the image of a beatific seraph in gold on one side and a fearsome fiend with seven eyes enameled in black on the other. While it may seem nothing more than a curiosity, it's a powerful agent of fortune when activated.

<document level="2" id="action-1688" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 8"
pfs="Standard"
>
Fortune's Coin
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 114 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 450 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 14"
pfs="Standard"
>
Fortune's Coin (Platinum)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 114 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 4,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

This coin is platinum instead of gold. The seraph side grants you a 14 instead of a 12.
name: Fortune's Coin
